/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars and pedestrians add life to the scene, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
